alert.note: Alert for Cleveland; Pottawatomie (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 04 at 5:53PM CDT until May 04 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN CLEVELAND AND WESTERN POTTAWATOMIE COUNTIES... At 553 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Tribbey, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Shawnee, Tecumseh, Maud, Asher, Tribbey, Wanette, St. Louis, Brooksville, Macomb, Harjo and Trousdale. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
